headline: Jim Cramer Says Dominion Energy’s “Story Has Been Simplified Significantly”
summary: Dominion Energy, Inc. (NYSE:D) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer put under the spotlight. Cramer discussed the company’s valuation and yield during the episode, as he said: “The story has been simplified significantly over the past couple of years after management reigned in the renewable investments and simplified its business, including with the sale […]

headline: Jim Cramer on Entergy: “The Stock’s Actually Going to Look Cheaper Forward”
summary: Entergy Corporation (NYSE:ETR) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer put under the spotlight. headline: Can DOE's Fuel Line Project Accelerate OKLO's Growth Story?
summary: DOE's selection propels OKLO into a leading role in U.S. nuclear fuel development, bolstering its growth and clean energy ambitions.
